about.name: Karabük Travel Guide
about.title: Karabük: Journey Through Time, Nature, and Tradition
about.description: Discover Karabük, Turkey. Discover natural wonders! Plan your travel route!
about.excerpt: Come travel the best that Turkey has to offer!
about.content:
Karabük is in Turkey and is filled with history and nature. This is a world UNESCO Site and a must to explore. The landscape provides an experience of a lifetime! Now you can plan a journey to the city. This travel guide will tell you all!

## Start To Travel

With every step you take you will uncover the beauty. This is the heart of what culture can provide to all. This is all for you to discover today!

## What You Must Travel

This section will help cover some must visits that one should see. From the nature to the old cities, there is something to bring joy!

### Beauty of the Past

What starts out with great history is through Safranbolu, all the world knows about this area! After that, make sure you discover Safranbolu Saat Kulesi! All of these will share what that old town has to offer and teach.

### The Beauty of Nature!

For a sight that cannot be seen elsewhere is from Yenice Ormanları. Come be part of something that has to speak to all! Another beautiful place to hike and be one with the water is Soğanlı Çayı, there has never been more to offer!

### Crafts and Hearts

There are moments of craft that all should explore. What most of the city knows is that you can go with Eflani Cember Bezi Yapımı. Come explore what it has to offer!

## Taste Local Food

The most popular is to taste local plates. What starts to pop up when it comes to Turkey is that there has to be a taste of that location! What is known in the area is Safranbolu Lokumu. But it is never a bad idea to taste Höşmerim. With all these things to taste it's up to you!

## How Do We Get That Plan Booked!

The area offers a great way to see a traditional culture of the locals. Plan what dates you would like to see! Everything can be adjusted so there is no reason not to discover Turkey!
